body.p: Residence: Ripley, Brown County, Ohio. An Ohio-born merchant. Son of Joseph B. Wiles and Harriet. Married Juliette B. Hathaway. Father of Harry Newton Wiles, Joseph B. Wiles, Nellie (Wiles) Kirker, Nathaniel Hathaway Wiles, and Leon Stivers Wiles.
